title: Missing 13-year-old found dead, Ottawa police confirm | CBC News
text:
The body of a missing 13-year-old boy was found Saturday afternoon, Ottawa police confirmed Sunday.

Alexandre Baron was last seen Oct. 22 when he stormed out of his Blossom Park home following an argument.

Ottawa police announced Saturday they found Baron, but did not say whether he was found alive.

Police confirmed Sunday he was found dead. They do not suspect his death is the result of foul play.

School grieving

Baron's principal described his death as a "devastating loss" for both his family and St. Francis Xavier High School, where he was a student.

"Our school community grieves," wrote Sean Kelly in a message to parents.

The high school is offering support to students Sunday afternoon and next week.

"Our thoughts and prayers are with Alexandre's family, and we wish them peace in the difficult days ahead," wrote Kelly.

Baron's family is asking for privacy, Ottawa police said.
description: The body of a 13-year-old missing boy was found Saturday afternoon, Ottawa police confirmed Sunday.
